summary: This is an encrypted email forwarding a grand jury subpoena response from American Airlines. The email includes attached records related to Ghislaine Maxwell and American Airlines travel, including passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and usage information.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email forwards records related to Ghislaine Maxwell in response to a grand jury subpoena, specifically American Airlines travel records including passenger reservations and ticket usage.

events.title: American Airlines provides travel records for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: American Airlines sends records related to Ghislaine Maxwell, including passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and ticket usage information, in response to a grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Encrypted email forwarding grand jury subpoena response
events.description: An encrypted email is sent forwarding the American Airlines response to a grand jury subpoena regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's travel records.

keyFacts: American Airlines provided Ghislaine Maxwell's travel records in response to a grand jury subpoena in February 2020.
The records included passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and ticket usage information.
The communication was encrypted, indicating sensitivity around the grand jury investigation.
The document shows ongoing investigative activity related to Ghislaine Maxwell in early 2020.
